186019480.review:
Nota: 🌟🌟🌟🌟☆ (4.5/5)

Black Desert Online é um MMORPG que redefine o gênero ao oferecer gráficos deslumbrantes, um sistema de combate fluido e um mundo vasto e vibrante. Desenvolvido pela Pearl Abyss, o jogo combina exploração, economia robusta e uma infinidade de atividades que atendem a diversos estilos de jogo.

Pontos Positivos:

Gráficos impressionantes: Mesmo após vários anos, BDO ainda é um dos MMORPGs mais bonitos do mercado, com paisagens ricas e detalhadas e efeitos climáticos dinâmicos.
Combate fluido e dinâmico: O sistema de combate em tempo real é extremamente responsivo, com combos que demandam habilidade e estratégia. Cada classe tem um estilo único que proporciona uma experiência diferenciada.
Mundo aberto rico: O jogo é um sandbox repleto de atividades como pesca, comércio, culinária, caça e criação de cavalos, além de um mercado controlado pelos jogadores.
Personalização de personagens: O editor de personagens é um dos mais detalhados de todos os tempos, permitindo criar avatares incrivelmente únicos.
Atualizações constantes: O jogo recebe conteúdos frequentes, com novas classes, áreas e eventos que mantêm o mundo vivo e dinâmico.
Pontos Negativos:

Curva de aprendizado íngreme: O jogo não é amigável para iniciantes. A quantidade de sistemas e mecânicas pode parecer esmagadora para novos jogadores.
Grind pesado: Progredir, especialmente nos níveis mais altos, exige um investimento considerável de tempo em grind, o que pode não agradar a todos.
Sistema P2W (Pay-to-Win): Embora seja possível aproveitar o jogo sem gastar dinheiro, aqueles que investem em compras no jogo têm uma vantagem significativa em progressão e conforto.
Falta de foco narrativo: A história principal é um pouco confusa e frequentemente ofuscada pelas inúmeras atividades disponíveis.
Veredito:
Black Desert Online é um MMORPG deslumbrante que oferece algo para quase todos os tipos de jogadores. Seja você um amante de combates frenéticos, um explorador casual ou um comerciante dedicado, o jogo tem um vasto mundo para ser descoberto. Contudo, ele demanda paciência e dedicação, especialmente para entender suas mecânicas mais profundas e progredir em um ambiente competitivo.

Se você busca um MMORPG que valorize liberdade, beleza e combate, BDO é uma experiência imperdível.

Black Desert — это игра, где ваше время можно легко потерять в бескрайних просторах, окруженных красотой, но при этом заставляющая вас задаваться вопросом: 'Почему я трачу три часа на сбор ягод?'

185931975.review:
The game has decent character creation and your own character's combat feels good.
BUT
Combat is garbage. That is because even though your character has fun ways to press buttons, your enemies could not be more boring and ugly.

Oh, yes, the game is also ridiculously ugly: Your character looks good, but will always have those same boring clothes on, unless you pay a lot of money for a costume, then another one, then another one.

Botting is natively supported by the game: Your workers will work for you while you are AFK, and you can fish while AFK.

The economy is infinitely stupid, as there is a price cap on trade goods. Take milk, for example. The  game's auction house determines every item's price, and above a certain limit it will never move. So milk is a resource impossible to obtain from the auction house, because it makes 0 sense to sell it, as it takes more energy and time and effort to collect than what you could sell it for. And that is the case with most items.

The story is dumb.

The world is ugly and very same-y.

Above a certain level you are forced into high risk PvP where you lose your stuff.

There are events when you have ultra high xp or drop rates. It makes 0 sense to play outside these events. Why would you play for 100 hours to get X when you could have done it in 10 hours?

You are pretty much required to buy pets, inventory slots, weight boosters, and other stuff from the cash shop, as without them it makes no sense to play this game.

185815918.review:
It's a great MMO. but it can feel overwhelming for new players without a guide—especially when navigating the starting zones.

If you’re just starting out, pick Velia as your starting area. Avoid Land of the Morning Light and Eternal Winter unless you know exactly what you’re doing. Focus on the main questline and take your time—don’t rush! If something doesn’t make sense, ask other players or join a newbie-friendly guild. The community can be helpful if you reach out.

Don’t stress about things like “how to level up faster,” “how to get to this AP,” or “what gear should I use.” Just enjoy the game at your own pace. If that doesn’t click with you, then this game might not be for you—and that’s okay!

Black Desert Online is complex. Some things are straightforward, but other mechanics take time to understand. However, the game offers so much variety: you can be a farmer, fisher, miner, horse trainer, hunter, chef, forager, lumberjack—the list goes on. If you’re into PvP or love competitive play, there’s plenty of that too. And for those who enjoy grinding like a no-lifer? Oh, this game has you covered.

If you’re thinking about diving in, wait for the game to be free again or grab it during a big sale (like 70% off). But if you can get it for free, that’s the best deal.

185726022.review:
Mein Spielerlebnis war leider eher problematisch als spaßig. Ich hatte bei meinem ersten Charakter die Möglichkeit, die vereinfache Questline zu nutzen. Dumm nur, dass diese Möglichkeit ausschließlich für nachfolgende Charaktere gemacht ist, die die Haupt-Storyline auf ihrem ersten Charakter durchgespielt haben (das steht so auf ihrer Website). Warum gibt es keine Abfrage, ob das jemals auf dem Account gemacht wurde? In diesem Fall führt die vereinfachte Questline dazu, dass man nur noch "Erreiche Level 20; 30; 35 etc." (und irgendwelche kleinen Nebenquests die einen effektiv nicht weiterbringen) bekommt - während nichts von der Karte aufgedeckt ist und sämtliche Erklärungen für Spielmechaniken (und die unübersichtlichen Interfaces) ausbleiben, da das in der Haupt-Questline passieren würde. Nochmal von neu anfangen ist keine Option, denn wichtige Rewards, die man nur einmal pro Season bekommt, würden damit auch gelöscht werden und der Verlust davon würde das Gameplay wesentlich anstrengender machen. 
Ohne Freunde würde ich kaum Informationen dazu bekommen, wie das Spiel überhaupt zu spielen ist, was relevant ist und welche Möglichkeiten es in dem Spiel gibt. Wie man Ausrüstung upgraded/gute Rüstung bekommt, arbeitet, Leute einstellt, Routen macht, Schiffe benutzt, auf dem Markt sinnvoll agiert und was es sonst alles so gibt, wird nicht eingeleitet. Gleichzeitig bin ich auch nun darauf angewiesen, dass meine Freunde mich nun auf ein relevantes Level hochziehen, denn alleine grinden gehen, um auf ein relevantes Level zu kommen, würde Tage, wenn nicht sogar Wochen dauern. 

Viele meiner Probleme wären vermeidbar gewesen, aber es gibt auch keine Lösung seitens des Spiels, um das ursprüngliche Problem zu beheben. Alle Möglichkeiten, die ich hatte, waren suboptimal und das hat das Spielerlebnis für mich leider etwas kaputt gemacht.

185699085.review:
Hodnocení: ★★★★☆ (4/5)

Úvod
Black Desert Online je MMORPG hra, která vás vtáhne do svého rozsáhlého a živého světa. S více než 500 hodinami nahraného času ( Na steamu.. Přes launcher asi 6k) mohu říct, že tato hra je jako dvojsečný meč – má své silné stránky, ale i některé nedostatky.

Grafika
Nádherná grafika: Jedním z nejvýraznějších aspektů této hry je její úžasná grafika. Detaily prostředí, postav a efektů vás okouzlí a vytvoří atmosféru, která vás přiměje prozkoumávat každý kout mapy.
Dynamické počasí a denní cyklus: Tyto prvky dodávají hře na realističnosti a prohlubují zážitek ze světa.
Otevřený svět a úkoly
Velký otevřený svět: Hra nabízí obrovský svět plný různých regionů, které můžete prozkoumávat. Každý kout skrývá tisíce úkolů, které vás udrží v akci.
Rozmanité úkoly: Od běžných questů po složitější úkoly, které vyžadují strategické myšlení a spolupráci s ostatními hráči.
Ekonomika a finance
Finance: Hra vyžaduje určité znalosti o ekonomice. Abyste byli úspěšní a mohli si užívat výhod s vašimi NPC kámoši, je důležité mít základní přehled o financích ve hře.
Je důležité si uvědomit, že hra vám nedá nic zdarma.(i když pod novým Pearl Abyss je hra výrazně lehčí než to bylo u Kakaa) Pro úspěšné pasivní získávání stříbra je nutné dobře rozmístit Node a také dobře rozmístit své NPC workers, tak aby bylo možné stále vyrábět určité věci, které následně prodáte na Aukci (kde se cena hýbe). 

Zbytek si budete muset zjistit každý sám :) abych vám nebral nadšení a radost

185692537.review:
สุดยอดเกม เล่นมาตั้งแต่เข้าไทย พรีออเดอร์ ปี2017 เปิดเล่นปี 2018 เล่นตั้งแต่นั้นมาจนถึง 2025 
พึ้งมีโอกาศได้เขียนรีวิวในนี้ก็เพราะว่าพึ้งขายรหัสเก่าไปแล้วมาเล่นสตีม
-เป็นเกมที่มีอะไรหลายอย่างให้ทำนอกจากการตีมอนเตอร์ เช่น ตกปลา เดินเรือการค้า การค้าบก ปลูกผัก ตัดต้นไม้ ดูดยางไม้ แร่เนื้อ แร่หนัง ดูดเลือดสัตว์ ขุดโสม จับม้าขาย ขายน้ำเชื้อม้า แปรธาตุ ทำอาหาร หลายสิ่งเหล่านี้สามารถทำตังให้คุณได้ บางอย่างทำให้คุณรวยอย่างมากได้เลยเช่นการการสร้างไอเทมประเภทกดใช้ ยาและอาหาร เป็นต้น (พยามดูของในตลาดว่าคนต้องการอะไร อะไรขาดแคลนเป็นที่ต้องการมาก)
-มีระบบคนงาน สามารถเอาคนงานผลิตกล่องการค้าต่างๆ หรือ อุปกรณ์สวมใส่คนและพาหนะต่างๆ เช่น ม้า และ ลา เป็นต้น
-แต่จุดมุ่งหมายหลักเกมนี้คือการ เน้นตีม้อนเตอร์เพื่อหาตังมาอัพอุปกรณ์หรืออาวุธและชุดเกราะในตัวเสียมากกว่า แต่คุณก็สามารถทำไลฟ์สกิวแบบข้างต้นที่กล่าวมาได้ในการหาเงินไม่จำเป็นต้องฆ่ามอนเตอร์เพื่อหาตังเสมอไป 
-เนื้อเรื่องเกมนี้ค่อนข้างธรรมดา ผู้เล่นส่วนใหญ่ไม่ค่อยสนใจเนื้อเรื่องมักจะกดข้ามไป แต่ถ้าคุณไม่ข้ามก็จะได้ค่อยๆเรียนรู้โลกนี้และบริบทของเมืองและตัวบุคคลต่างๆในเกม 
-แผนที่เกมนี้กว้างใหญ่มากไม่ใช่แค่เฉพาะบนบกแต่ทะเลก็ด้วย
-การ PVP เกมนี้ในเซิฟเวอร์ที่ไม่ใช้สำหรับ PVP คุณจะเสียแต้มความดีหรืออุปนิสัย ถ้าลดลงติดลบเมื่อไหร่การที่คุณจะใช้ชีวิตลำบากมาก ผู้คนสามารถฆ่าคุณได้โดยไม่จำเป็นต้องกดเปิด PVP และไม่เสียแต้มความดีด้วย ถ้าคุณถูกฆ่าตายในขณะที่แต้มความดีติดลนนั้นจะทำให้เจมคุณแตกรวมถึงระดับการตี+ของอาวุธลดลงมาด้วย (กรณีคุณโดนฆ่าหลายครั้ง) และคุณจะเข้าเมืองไปทำอะไรยากมาก เพราะทหารยาม NPC จะวิ่งเข้ามาตีคุณโดยที่คุณไม่สามารถต่อกรกับมันได้และยังมีเหล่าผู้เล่นด้วยกันเองด้วยที่จะมาฆ่าคุณในเมืองได้ (ในเมืองเป็นจุดเซฟโซนไม่สามารถเปิด PVP ตีกันได้ แต่กรณีที่คุณค่าความดีติดลบแล้วเข้าเมืองผู้เล่นคนอื่นสามารถฆ่าคุณในเมืองได้)
-ระบบการตี+ของเกมนี้ยากมาก โอกาศติดน้อยมากแต่ถือว่าดีขึ้นจากเมื่อสมัยเกมเปิดแรกๆเยอะ เนื่องจากยังมีระบบการันตีที่ว่า ถ้าคุณตีไม่ติดบ่อยๆเกมจะมีระบบที่ทำให้คุณที่ติด 100เปอเซนเลย โดยมีแก๊ปไว้ให้ตัวอย่างเช่น จาก IV ไป V ถ้าคุณตีไม่ติดครบ 30 รอบเกมจะให้คุณรอบที่ 31 ตี+100เปอเซนในการตี+สำเร็จ
-ชุดแฟร์ในเกมนี้ค่อนข้างแพงเมื่อเทียบกับค่าแรงขั้นต่ำในไทย ราคาเต็มของชุดเมื่อไม่มีใบลดราคา คือ 500 600 800 แล้วแต่ชุด 
-สำคัญสำหรับผู้เล่นใหม่ ระบบขายของในตลาดจะมีการหักภาษี แนะนำให้กดใช้เอมเทมห่อสารพัดประโยชน์ก่อนที่จะกดรับตังจากการขายไอเทมในตลาด คุณจะสามารถรับเงินได้เพิ่มอีก 30เปอเซน การคำนวนเป็นอย่างนี้ ภาษีตลาด+เมืองรวม 35% คุณขาย 100 ได้ 65 ถ้าคุณกดห่อสารพัดประโยชน์จะได้เพิ่ม คือ 65+30% = 84.5 นั้นคือจำนวนเงินที่คุณได้จากการขายไอเทม ห่อสารพัดประโยชน์สามารถได้จากการเติมเงิน 330บ.(ได้ห่อ30วัน)หรือล้อกอินรายวันแล้วนำแต้มไมล์ไปซื้อในร้านค้าไมล์ 2800 ไมล์ (ได้ห่อ1วัน) ออน1วันได้ 200 ไมล์

Ingredientes

Despeje a massa em uma forma untada.
Asse a 180°C por 30-40 minutos E Pronto aproveite seu delicioso bolo

185577602.review:
Hi to all the BDO fans out there, shortly after the launch of BDO in 2014, I started playing day after day after day, but during the launch we on steam where only given the option to join the Turkey or NA region. Turkey was at that point the better option for those of us in South Africa. Since then they have retired the original BDO, and we had to reinstall the remastered version, they did not even bother transferring  our original play time, or giving us the option to relocate to the EU server which would have been better connection wise for us in South Africa. So we plottered on, on the servers we where assigned, and since last year it had become impossible to enjoy BDO, due to the fact that logging in was a issue and if you got in, even mounting your horse was started becoming a task of up to 10 min. I did an inquiry if they could move my account to EU as I have obtained allot of cosmetic items over the years and the first GM repied as follow: 

Arethel, Chief of Obsidian Ashes
"Since you are a "Steam" player, there is no option to change the server you play on in our game because "Steam" servers are automatically determined according to the country the player is connected to. It means the country you connect to the game is determined by the regional settings automatically specified to you by "Steam". Due to this automatic process, we cannot take any action. In addition, there are differences between regions, such as pricing, so it would be unfair to transfer any account from one region to another. 

If you want to play on another server; you can create a new account from the official website of the region that you want to play. Then, you can download the "Client" to join the server that you want to play. But please note that you have to purchase our game again if you want to create a new account from the website.   "

The second Gm Replied:
GM Torres from Alejandro Farm!
I absolutely understand your feelings but even if we try to move an account to another region, we cannot do it systematically because our developer team has not prepared a procedure or a tool for this process. That is why moving accounts to other regions is not possible.

We always try to support our Adventurers but sometimes we are not able to take action according to their requests. I regret to state once again that there are no procedures that we can apply for your case.

Thank you for your understanding.

If you want to ask another question, do not hesitate to contact us via a new ticket! 😊

Also, we would be happy to see you on our official "Discord" server, where you can chat with our Black Desert community and be informed about announcements. 

and then again GM Torres:
You can be sure that we will forward all of your thoughts and your replies to our relevant teams regarding your situation. I know that you are not getting the answers that you expected but since we as GMs cannot take action related to those topics or processes, we are also sorry about this but you can be sure that your thoughts will be investigated by the correct team because we are not the ones who can make those decisions or who can take direct action for those technical requests. 

If an account transfer option is decided to be integrated into the game in the future, it will be announced by our official announcements so you can try to follow them from time to time. 

Once again, thank you for your understanding."

I'm sorry but there is no understanding, most games have a migration system in place for problems like these, i do not mind paying for migration, to make BDO playable again, the audacity to tell me i have to repurchase BDO on a new region if i want to move to EU and start from nothing is unacceptable. My husband had an EU account option drop box on steam a couple of days ago when he installed to join me, so how can they say we do not have a choice in the matter of which region to join. I was looking forward to crimson desert soon to be released, but no more. Until they give us a account migration option I'm done with pearl abyss, I wasted to much time money and effort in the retired BDO and the remastered BDO and they could not even bother to carry over the original time played to the new remastered installation, nor make sure there servers could carry the load. So i Said what i wanted to say and am deeply saddened to stop playing BDO, but it is wat it is, and it does not seam they care about losing players.

185482244.review:
Farmeo chino extremo y PAY TO FAST


MEJORAR EQUIPO


Para mejorar tus armas y armaduras tienes las opciones de:

-Farmear estando AFK con ciertas profesiones. (24/7) a pagar la luz $$$

-Matar mobs por meses y comprarlo a otros jugadores en el mercado.

-Comprar los recursos para jugar a la suerte de subirlo o no (o que se rompa o degrade si falla en subir) con probabilidades de 0.03% incluso teniendo altas acumuladas.

PD:

Cada 6 meses o 1 año agregan nuevo equipo superando al anterior, y muy posiblemente por medio de eventos o misiones regalaran a todos un equipo muy cercano o el mismo al que tenias.



LEVEO DE PERSONAJE


Vas a matar como un Dynasty Warrior; grupos de mobs sin ninguna inteligencia artificial. en donde solo importara si cumples con las Stats optimas para hacer rotaciones y conseguir la mayor exp y/o drop. repetir hasta subir de lvl tu pjs o conseguir suficiente plata.

WARNING: Esto te puede tomar semanas, meses. Incluso con buff de drop y de mas, es una locura. ejemplo: hay eventos de hasta 3000%+ de exp y aun asi es un meme subir de lvl, sigue siendo de enfermos y monoto



PVP LIBRE


te castiga con un estado de ''buscado'' (karma negativo) el cual solo podrás quitar subiendo ''fama'' (karma en + positivo) matando mobs a lo bestia (hay un limite y sube muy poco actualmente incluso nerfearon las pociones para conseguir mas)

ACLARO: El karma negativo puede llegar a grandes números mientras que el positivo no tanto. Si te matan con karma negativo pierdes mucha exp de lvl, se rompen tus gemas y equipos (cosas muy valiosas y difíciles de subir y conseguir)



PVP ASALTO


''Guerra de clanes por territorios'' Los servidores no están optimizados, veras muchas inconsistencias, te agarraran estando ya fuera del alcance o te meteran CC estando invulnerable.

Modo arena y una especie de battleroyale, esta tan lleno de hackers y desbalanceado que hay ocaciones en que los devs cierran estos modos.



JEFES DIARIOS Y SEMANALES


Mecánicas monótonas y sencillas. (bajarle la barra de vida lo mas rápido posible así sin mas) PD: habrá tanta gente en 1 mismo lugar que aveces no alcanzaras a pegarle al jefe ya sea por lo rápido que morirá o el lag que tendrás por culpa de los pésimos servidores.

Se hará necesario subir y equipar diferentes personajes y parquearlos en cada uno de los jefes para así ''ahorrar'' tiempo, y tener una mínima % de conseguir el premio mayor.

CONCLUSIÓN

NO vale la pena jugarlo y si es por el combate y animaciones de personaje, ya sabes lo que te espera en mid-end game.

185470559.review:
Гра з "топовим графоном" виявилась проблемним шлаком:

1. Гра автоматично кидає тебе на RU сервери. Я розумію, що розробники стараються бути внєпалітікі, але, бляха, вигягніть голову з дупи і подивіться, що рашка робить з моєю країною, для початку! Виявилось, що ця проблема в багатьох (якщо не всіх) українців. І щоб виправити цю проблему, треба йти в службу підтримки і благати техпідтримку, щоб вони перенесли твій аккаунт на EU регіон, і дехто каже, що це не завжди працює. Вже простіше купити якусь анімешну інді виживалку, аніж заставляти себе "насолоджуватись" всім цим неподобством.

2. Гра з самісінького початку вкине тебе в незрозумілий, доволі ліниво поданий лор з купою невиразних персонажів. Одноманітні квести з купою грінда, купа непотрібних діалогів. За проходження перших квестів тебе нагороджують купою предметів, з якими треба довго розбиратися, куди їх діти, чи як застосувати.

3. Інтерфейс - це окреме пекло! Купа вікон, ніфіга не ясно. Тебе буквально на перших годинах гри закидують якимись призами, івентами, вікнами з тоною інформації. Ти не можеш відчути, ніби ти можеш робити в цій грі щось конкретне, що принесло б тобі задоволення. Тебе вічно щось відволікає, інтуїтивне мислення тут не спрацює - треба сидіти, вчитуватись в гайди. Таке відчуття, ніби не ти граєш в гру, а гра грає тебе.

4. Бойова система дещо громіздка, хоча анімації прикольні. Все виглядає потужно (занадто потужно). Ти не відчуваєш себе воїном, а радше, магом, який одним рухом може викосити цілу армію (але це до першого боса). Я так і не второпав, як працює прокачка. То я якось випадково намацав інтерфейс, де можна вкладати якісь кристали, то після кожного підняття рівня гра тебе просить тицьнути лише на одну єдину іконку, ігноруючи доволі велике дерево навичок. Деякі уміння розблокуються чи покращуються самі, якщо я правильно зрозумів. Знову ж таки, у грі відбувається так багато процесів, що услідити за всім, як воно працює, з першого разу неможливо.

5. Крафт? Так! У грі є крафт. Але вперше тобі дадуть завдання крафтити щось аж на другій годині гри. До того ти просто будеш ходити з купою мотлоху в рюкзаку, і гра тобі навіть не натякне, що ти можеш скрафтити щось корисне з того, що ти здобув у бою, чи ще якось.

6. P2W - я звісно до цього ще не добрався, але натяків мені вистачало. Гра регулярно тобі буде нагадувати, що в неї є якісь там унікальні предмети і одяг, але ти це можеш купити за якісь там перли.

7. Відсутність послідовного навчання. Гра намагається тобі через силу згодовувати якийсь сюжет, що поданий у вигляді одноманітних місій. Туторіал, який можна пройти після створення персонажа, покаже тільки самі базові (банальні навіть) механіки, про які й так можна здогадатись. Далі тобі треба буде спілкуватися з купою НІПів, які ніби як будуть згадувати про деякі складніші ігрові механіки. Нема такого, щоб тебе вводили в розуміння гри поступово. Ти проходиш сюжетні місії і постійно відволікаєшся на перенасичений інтерфейс, купу індикаторів і тебе не відпускає відчуття, що ти щось робиш не так, або граєш гру так, як того хочуть розробники, а не ти сам.

Єдине, що можна виділити з плюсів у грі, це досі хороший графон, непогані краєвиди, широкі можливості в кастомізації персонажа, що розробники й подали як свою візитну картку. А так, приємного мало.
Моя оцінка: 5 з 10. Діткам, що виросли на тіктокові зайде.

185433728.review:
I was super excited to give this game a try when I got it for free. It looked gorgeous, the gameplay seemed solid, and I’d heard so much about its massive open world. At first, everything seemed great—exploring, grinding, and soaking up the beautiful graphics was just as fun as I imagined. But then... the reality of Xigncode hit.

Let me explain: Xigncode is the game's anti-cheat software, and it’s the reason I’m ultimately not recommending BDO. Sure, anti-cheat is important, but Xigncode feels way too invasive. It scans your entire PC, sticks around even after you uninstall the game, and requires manual removal to fully get rid of it. That’s not just inconvenient—it’s alarming.

The worst part? Xigncode is tied to a company with concerning ties to the Chinese government, and it’s hard to ignore the privacy risks involved. Even though I enjoyed my time with BDO, I value my personal data and security far more than any game.

The game itself is fantastic if you can look past the pay-to-win mechanics and overwhelming systems for new players. But as long as Xigncode is part of the deal, I can’t recommend it in good conscience.

I might AFK this tho, because of the trading cards.

Play it if you’re okay with the trade-offs, but for me? This was my last run with BDO. Goodbye, and good luck

Ignore those that say its P2W, unless you wanna pvp at top level, just dont worry about it. They give you all the stuff for free if you play regularly.

Best Combat System. Best Life Skill system. Unlimited leveling. HUGE world. Real Time travel, including real time wagon trains to move large amounts.

This game is amazing and if you take a break from it, your daily rewards (money, items) just keeps snowballing so when you return you can catch up quick with the money you earned.

I play on a super low spec PC and it runs at 80 FPS, and it looks amazing. If you play on remastered graphics it look stunning.

This is essentially the game from Sword Art Online, and it has AFK training like fishing, horse riding, strength training, experience gain (its small), and life skill gain.

9.1/10

185298151.review:
SO 87 hours in, how do I feel?. 
It's alright.

As a new player coming in, they set you up to succeed, and while they don't really explain the more complex systems the game has, they give you enough to play the game and the community is usually pretty helpful in game chat if you ask a question. Community is pretty cool overall. The biggest issue this game has is the game being almost entirely a solo game. There is PvP, but everything you do to get your character ready for endgame PvP(hundreds of hours) is almost entirely solo content. It's a great RPG and the grinding 'experience is really fun in my opinion to thanks to the AMAZING combat system. But if you're expecting big raids with lots of players and packed world bosses. This isn't your game, however if you're just looking to grind, set goals and achieve them, and stare at booba, this is the game for you.

185174625.review:
Графіка гри трохи краща за конкурентів, але якість зображення залишається “мильною”. Надмірно яскрава й перенасичена кольорова палітра швидко втомлює очі, що псує враження.

Гра майже не оптимізована. Системні вимоги занадто високі: без потужного комп’ютера навіть не варто намагатися грати. Для MMORPG це неприйнятно, оскільки цей жанр зазвичай потребує скромніших ресурсів.

Основний сюжет провалений, а гравця навантажують другорядними історіями та біографіями NPC, які виглядають непотрібними й нецікавими. Ігнорувати це неможливо, адже так звані “знання”, отримані від NPC, дають бонуси. Тому, щоб розкрити всі можливості гри, доводиться виконувати нудні завдання, пов’язані з пошуком NPC, замість того щоб насолоджуватися боєм.

Система інвентаря дратує. Вага предметів напряму впливає на витривалість персонажа, змушуючи звертатися до донату. Якщо хочеш комфортної гри — купуй речі для збільшення вантажопідйомності. А ось місця в інвентарі доведеться купувати окремо. Донат сам по собі прийнятний, але в цій грі він поданий надмірно нав’язливо.

Бойова система виглядає непогано, але геймплей зводиться до банальних завдань: “подої корову”, “убий ворога” або “принеси щось із трупів”.

Я не зміг розкрити всі аспекти гри, адже видалив її ще до цього. Якщо бути чесним, ця гра гірша за більшість азійських гриндових MMORPG.

185138942.review:
Only seven hours playtime? (and most of that was spent in character creator)

How can that be enough time to even get an impression on a game, much less an MMO that's meant to be played endlessly?

Well... you know what they say about first impressions? Black Desert doesn't really make a good one.

That's not to say that Black Desert is bad. Or maybe it is, I dunno... after all, I didn't really play it long enough to find out.

But every single one of those seven hours was spent in boredom.

Look, MMOs are a serious investment. They require extensive amounts of time and money from players. Any entertainment product demanding that much had better be worth it, and I just didn't see anything in 7 hours playing BDO that convinced me that it is.

For all intents and purposes, BDO is a bog standard MMO that features all the trappings of every MMO ever. So if you want your MMO fix, you can already get it anywhere. About the only standout feature in BDO is the over the top action combat system - which is more akin to a fighting game with combos and everything - but which you can also get in plenty of other MMOs, like TERA. 

BDO's other claim to fame is the extensive visual character customization system which is, ultimately, not that extensive... I mean, it's robust to be sure, but it's no more than you can expect from character creators in games like Dragon's Dogma or Fallout 4 and dozens of other examples. And it doesn't really lend much to the game, as like with every MMO now, BDO pretty much completely disregards any notion of roleplaying.

Because apparently, what passes for "roleplaying" these days is just having classes and skills; and the classes on offer in BDO are underwhelming, to say the least. First of all, there's a lot of them and they're all bizzarely gender locked for some ostensible reason. And in terms of combat, they're all going to feel the same anyway. The combo system is all sorts of clunky. And in the seven hours I played, I actually got to partake of combat hardly at all. Like every MMO, BDO has you going through the standard slog of following quests through a story too boring to be interested in. The moment I found myself skipping dialog and not even bothering to pay attention to the quest objectives was a moment that underscored how much I was playing yet another MMO.

And in that time I was bereft of any incentive to continue playing Black Desert Online. I have played MMOs before - hundreds of hours (and more money than I care to admit) in some. Almost all of them are exactly alike (thanks Warcrap) and I have no willingness to spend time on them. Why play BDO when I could be playing any one of dozens of MMOs just like it? Some of them even do the same things BDO does, only better.

185133879.review:
[h2]Black Desert: Atemberaubende Grafik mit Schattenseiten[/h2]

Black Desert ist ein MMORPG, das durch seine beeindruckende Grafik und weitläufige Spielwelt Aufmerksamkeit erregt. Während das Spiel in vielerlei Hinsicht glänzt, gibt es jedoch einige Aspekte, die das Spielerlebnis trüben.

[h3]Grafik und Weltgestaltung – Ein visuelles Meisterwerk[/h3]
Ohne Frage ist die Grafik eine der besten im Genre. Die detailreichen Umgebungen, realistischen Charaktermodelle und flüssigen Animationen schaffen eine immersive Welt, die Spieler stundenlang erkunden können. Die Liebe zum Detail und die Schönheit der Landschaften machen das Spiel zu einem visuellen Genuss.

[h3]Komplexes Kampfsystem und umfangreiche Inhalte[/h3]
Das Kampfsystem ist dynamisch und bietet eine Vielzahl an Kombos und Fähigkeiten, die das Kämpfen abwechslungsreich gestalten. Zudem gibt es eine Fülle von Inhalten wie Handel, Handwerk und Quests, die eine langfristige Beschäftigung ermöglichen.

[h3]Pay-2-Win-Mechaniken – Ein trüber Beigeschmack[/h3]
Leider wird das positive Spielerlebnis durch die deutlichen P2W-Elemente getrübt. Viele Spieler bemängeln, dass der Progress stark durch den Kauf von Gegenständen oder Boosts beschleunigt werden kann. Dies schafft ein Ungleichgewicht zwischen zahlenden und nicht-zahlenden Spielern und mindert die Freude am fairen Wettbewerb.

[h3]Langzeitmotivation und Balancing[/h3]
Obwohl das Spiel mit seiner Welt und den Möglichkeiten zu Beginn fasziniert, leidet das Spiel auf lange Sicht unter einem unzureichenden Balancing. Die Dominanz der P2W-Mechaniken kann bei vielen Spielern zu Frustration führen und die Motivation, langfristig zu bleiben, schmälern.

[h3]Fazit[/h3]
Black Desert ist ein optisches Highlight und bietet zahlreiche Möglichkeiten, sich in seiner Welt zu verlieren. Doch die P2W-Inhalte und das damit verbundene Ungleichgewicht können das Spielerlebnis stark beeinträchtigen. Für Spieler, die bereit sind, in den Shop zu investieren, mag das Spiel eine langfristige Herausforderung bieten. Für alle anderen kann der Fortschritt jedoch schnell zur Geduldsprobe werden.

185098363.review:
Black Desert — это игра, где ваше время можно легко потерять в бескрайних просторах, окруженных красотой, но при этом заставляющая вас задаваться вопросом: 'Почему я трачу три часа на сбор ягод?' 

Сначала вы берете в руки меч и думаете, что станете великим героем, но вскоре осознаете, что больше времени проводите, пытаясь приручить своего питомца, чем сражаясь с монстрами. Питомцы, кстати, тоже имеют свои капризы: они могут быть более требовательными, чем ваша бабушка на семейном ужине!

И кто бы мог подумать, что жизнь кочевника включает в себя не только сражения, но и огромное количество крафта? Вы можете стать мастером обработки камней, но вот беда — ваша жизнь превращается в бесконечную гонку за ресурсами. 'Где же я оставил свои 50 единиц шкурки?' — это вопрос, который вы будете задавать себе чаще, чем 'Где мой меч?'

Не забудьте про PvP! Это как свидание вслепую, но вместо романтической беседы вы получаете эпическое столкновение с незнакомцем, который, кажется, провел последние три месяца, прокачивая своего персонажа. 

В общем, если вы мечтаете о бесконечном веселье, где вы можете быть и охотником, и собирателем, и мастером крафта, и одновременно не успеть сделать ни того, ни другого, Black Desert — это именно то, что вам нужно!

184973995.review:
Review in 2025. Its a decent mmorpg if you like action combat and gorgeous women and cool looking guys. Comparing to WoW its shallow but the graphics are way better and not cartoon-like. The world is big but not as big as WoW. Endgame is a grind for items gear levels etc. It feels mostly single player compared to wow party system. The game is very active with people all over. 

If you are worried about the longevity of the game then i suggest playing World of Warcraft. That game may outlive all of us! This game has been around 10 years with an active playerbase still so i believe this game is in the clear for another 5 plus years ( probably longer than you are willing to play ). 

My biggest concerns with this game is the solo content and how you dont group up with people. Yeah, you get to see them, you get to talk with them in group chat, but at my current level of 55 i have not grouped once and from the chat they all say its grinding and afk fishing etc. I dont mind solo playing but i do enjoy teaming up with others as well. From an mmo perspective its the best looking but newer games are coming that have graphics on par or better.

Its worth 10 bucks if you not a hardcore WoW player and you want an immersive world.

184952381.review:
Black Desert Online ist ein MMORPG, das in nahezu jeder Hinsicht beeindruckt. Die atemberaubende Grafik ist wohl eines der markantesten Merkmale des Spiels. Die detailreichen Landschaften, lebendig wirkenden Städte und der realistische Charakterdesign lassen die Welt von Black Desert fast wie ein interaktives Kunstwerk erscheinen. Das Spiel zieht einen direkt in seinen Bann, wenn man durch die eindrucksvoll gestalteten Gebirgspässe oder malerischen Strände reist.

Der Spielspaß kommt ebenfalls nicht zu kurz. Es gibt eine riesige Menge an Quests, die sowohl für Gelegenheitsspieler als auch für Hardcore-Gamer eine Herausforderung darstellen. Die Queststrukturen sind abwechslungsreich, und selbst die Nebenaufgaben bieten oft spannende Erlebnisse. Besonders lobenswert ist das dynamische Kampfsystem, das flüssige Bewegungen und taktische Tiefe bietet, wodurch jede Schlacht fesselnd und individuell wird.

Ein absolutes Highlight ist der Charakter-Editor, der mit seinen unzähligen Anpassungsoptionen beinahe keine Wünsche offenlässt. Hier kann jeder Spieler seinen Avatar bis ins kleinste Detail gestalten – vom Gesichtsausdruck bis zur Körperform. Das macht den Einstieg in das Spiel zu einem kreativen und einzigartigen Erlebnis.

Alles in allem bietet Black Desert Online eine fesselnde Spielerfahrung, die durch ihre visuelle Pracht, die Vielfalt an Aktivitäten und den tiefgründigen Charaktereditor zu einem echten Meisterwerk im MMORPG-Genre wird. Wer auf der Suche nach einem Spiel ist, das nicht nur mit einer packenden Story, sondern auch mit außergewöhnlicher Grafik und Spielmechanik überzeugt, wird hier definitiv fündig.

184883950.review:
Black Desert - 2/5 ⭐⭐
Zeitpunkt der Rezession: 2,5 Stunden

-----------
Positives:
-----------

✅ gutes Intro
✅ tolle Grafik im Charaktereditor
✅ deutsche Untertitel
✅ Gegner auf einem guten (niedrigen) Niveau
✅ Markierungen zum Ziel sind relativ übersichtlich
✅ viele verschiedene Kriegscharakter wählbar


-----------
Negatives
-----------
❌ schlechte Grafik im Spiel
❌ schlechte Laufsteuerung
❌ Spiel hakt teils ordentlich, trotz aktuellem Gaming PC
❌ Spielewelt (inkl Gegner) ist komplett überlaufen
❌ Alle Charaktere meines damaligen Accounts (nicht über Steam) sind WEG!


-------------------
Kaufempfehlung?
-------------------

🔲 Ja (uneingeschränkt)
🔲 Im Angebot kaufen
✅ Nein


------
Fazit
------

Ich habe Black Desert früher schon einmal gespielt und fand es ganz ansprechend aufgrund der Grafik und der Optik der erstellbaren Charaktere.

Heute wollte ich dem Spiel nochmal eine Chance geben, jedoch muss ich sagen, dass es mich so gar nicht packt. Das einzige MMORPG, was ich seit Januar 2016 täglich spiele ist "The Elder Scrolls Online". Alle anderen MMORPGs (und ich habe sicher über 20 Stück gespielt) haben mich nicht lange am spielen gehalten.

Die Grafik tut meinen Augen weh, die Spielewelt ist überfüllt von Monstern / Gegnern und generell finde ich leider nichts, was mich an diesem Spiel fesseln könnte. 

Hätte ich es nicht kostenlos erhalten, hätte ich es beide Male wohl nie gespielt. 

Ich finde es gut, dass man (zumindest zu Beginn) sehr stark ist und hoffe, dass dies auch in Zukunft beibehalten wird - jedoch fehlt mir auch in diesem MMORPG der richtige "Kick", um dabeizubleiben. 

Natürlich ist dies Geschmackssache. 

Zudem tut die Grafik (eingestellt, wie immer, auf beste Auflösung und 2K Grafik) meinen Augen weh, sobald ich mich bewege. Die NPCs sehen ganz nett aus, aber zB. die Wölfe zu Beginn wirken recht "eckig" und etwas billig gemacht. Über all das könnte ich ja noch hinwegschauen - zumal man sich endlich mal einen geil aussehenden Charakter erstellen kann - aber es fesselt mich einfach nichts am Spiel.

Zudem musste ich mir einen neuen Charakter mit Level 1 erstellen, obwohl ich bereits einige Charaktere (nicht über Steam) hatte. Ein absolutes NO-GO!

184815985.review:
Взял из-за красивых женских фигур. На деле оказались странными - личики детские, уродливо длинные ноги внизу тонюсенькие. Грудь трясётся как холодец. Собрал себе лучницу, побежал воевать - она одета совсем по-другому, не так, как я нарядил. В каких-то чулках что ли или гольфах - не знаю, как это называется. Попытался переодеть снова в нормальную одежду - в поле она снова в коротком платьице с чулками. Как маленькая девочка. Вместе с детскими личиками это уже извращение получается.
В остальном игра некрасивая. Графика на максимум - не заметна разница от средних значений. Задания странные - пойти разрубить камень. Подошёл, один раз ударил (причём, не ударил, а дал команду ударить - и откуда-то кайло в руках оказалось) - разрубил. Боёвка ещё более странная. На меня нападают огромные монстры (в виде деревьев что-ли), я сначала начал маневрировать, а потом оказалось, что они с одного выстрела убиваются. Можно просто стоять и лениво в них стрелять. То же самое после камня - приказали уничтожить стаю волков. Я два раза выстрелил - нет стаи. Что произошло - непонятно. Всё сумбурно. Управление неудобное. Но, возможно, нужно привыкнуть. Хотел стереть, но если получится изменить персонажа (стыдно бегать в чулочках), то попробую поиграть ещё. Но вряд ли стану хотя бы из-за боёвки - она очень невнятная. Специально взял лучника, чтобы было понятно - куда стреляешь, того и того, в отличии от меча - там машешь тупо - куда попал, туда и попал, но даже с лучником каша какая-то получается, а не бой.
И - да - самое мерзкое - наставник - чёрный дух, с которым я по игре заключил какой-то договор. Это что такое?? Впрочем, чего ожидать от игры с уклоном в педофилию?

184757187.review:
This game is the best-looking MMO out right now. 
Is there grinding. Yes. But what MMO doesn't require you to grind? The graphics is great and all the moves in the game look great. It is actually fun doing quests and grinding. Something that World Of Warcraft never captivated me to do. Also you press a button and it takes you to your next quest. I love that.
I've only logged on 50 plus hours so far but it's been great. The amount of classes is excellent and they all look so great doing their moves. Spending money in-game is worth it for me as it gives me more enjoyment than a paid subscription to some of the other MMOs out there like Final Fantasy and WoW.
It's free so give it a shot before you blow your money on Final Fantasy and/or WoW.
I've played all three and can safely say this is my favourite.
Hope you all have a great new year and happy gaming. :)

184729970.review:
"Black Desert Online" – das Spiel, in dem du dich fragst, ob du ein MMORPG zockst oder heimlich in einem Schönheitswettbewerb gelandet bist.

Willkommen in der Welt von Black Desert Online – wo die Charaktererstellung mehr Zeit frisst als so mancher Uni-Abschluss! Du kannst jedes Detail anpassen: von der Haarlänge über die Augenbrauenbiegung bis zur präzisen Neigung deiner Nasenspitze. Und ja, wenn du erstmal drei Stunden damit verbracht hast, die perfekte virtuelle Version von dir selbst zu erstellen, wirst du feststellen, dass du eigentlich einen Helm trägst.

Aber Black Desert Online ist mehr als nur ein glorifizierter Charakter-Editor. Es ist ein MMORPG mit einer riesigen, atemberaubenden Welt, die aussieht, als hätte jemand einen HDR-Filter auf die Realität geklatscht. Glitzernde Wiesen, majestätische Städte, leuchtende Strände – alles perfekt, außer dass du ständig von Monstern gejagt wirst.

Das Kampfsystem? Oh, Junge. Vergiss das langweilige Anklicken von Gegnern. Hier geht’s ab wie im Actionfilm: wilde Combos, blitzschnelle Ausweichmanöver und Fähigkeiten, bei denen du denkst, du spielst Street Fighter in einer Fantasy-Welt. Es ist so befriedigend, dass du manchmal vergisst, dass der Boss dich gerade in den Boden stampft.

Und dann die Berufe: Du kannst alles sein, was du willst! Fischer, Koch, Händler, Farmer – ja, du kannst sogar eine florierende Bier-Brauerei aufbauen. Aber pass auf, denn Wirtschaft und Handel sind hier fast schon realistischer als in der echten Welt. Während du versuchst, deine Waren von A nach B zu bringen, wirst du feststellen, dass die Straße voller Banditen ist – und plötzlich denkst du dir: „Hätte ich doch mal Kampfskills geskillt, statt mein Pferd zu frisieren.“

Die Story? Ähm … gibt’s. Irgendwas mit Schwarzem Geist, uralten Geheimnissen und viel Geschwurbel. Ehrlich gesagt wirst du so abgelenkt von den wunderschönen Landschaften und all den Sachen, die du tun kannst, dass du die Hauptquest leicht ignorierst. Aber keine Sorge: Der Schwarze Geist taucht immer wieder auf, um dich mit gruseligem Lachen daran zu erinnern, dass du noch was zu erledigen hast.

184724984.review:
На звание "самой красивой MMORPG", как её иногда величают в интернетах, она явно не тянет. Кривые лицевые анимации в диалогах и зацикленная, совершенно не подходящая к ситуации жестикуляция портят всё впечатление от прохождения и без того немудрёного сюжета. Некоторые диалоги так и вообще вызывают спонтанные фейспалмы. "Спасибо тебе за помощь. Моей девушке продолжают сниться кошмары, поэтому я решил, как и ты, отправиться повидать мир"... 

Новичков на сезонных серверах первые дни просто заваливают разными плюшками, но даже это не способно исправить впечатление от багов и крывых роликов. Да и  что-то мне подсказывает, что после некоторого количества игровых дней за те же самые плюшки придётся очень скучно фармить гринд или не менее скучно донатить. 184719858.review:
Tried it out since it was free. Which I am glad it was free because the new player experience feels awful despite the game's combat looking cool and flashy. Despite that, the combat doesn't feel that great either, but man does it look cool.

One day I might try it again, but after 5 hours of playing, the game feels pointless, soulless, unintuitive, and in general it just feels bad. But look! The combat looks cool!

No matter how cool the combat looks, if I can't get into a game and feel excited about playing it within 5 hours then the game is bad. Looking cool does not make a good game. Even so, the game doesn't look out of this world in my opinion. I think the character models look rather dated. (Let's be honest though, what MMO doesn't?)

Perhaps the game will one day be streamlined and it's UI and systems will be reworked but as it stands now, I can not recommend this game unless you REALLY want to trudge through the steep and seemingly pointless learning curve.

Jeu avec de super graphismes, la dessus rien à dire. Mais trop de jeux de lumières qui, à mon avis, vont me rendre épileptique.

En conclusion, j'aurais bien aimé que vous simplifiez l'ensemble. Quand on veut faire une action sur un loup, comme le dépeçage ou une autre option, faut appuyer sur F5 ou F6 et c'est mal fait parce que les F5 / F6 sont loin de mes touches principales.
L'inventaire est trop compliqué, les quêtes de début on nous lâche la dedans mais on comprend rien, il y a trop de dialogues etc ...
Je suis entre le "recommande" et "passez votre chemin".
Testez le, vous verrez bien.

184534460.review:
I’ve spent thousands of hours in Black Desert (not on Steam, but through the original launcher), and honestly, it’s been a wild ride. The game’s combat is one of the best I’ve ever experienced in an MMO, and the world is massive. There’s always something to do, whether it’s grinding, trading, cooking, fishing, or just aimlessly riding my horse across beautiful landscapes.

That said, the game isn’t perfect. Both the progression system and gear enhancement can be quite punishing once you reach a certain point. PvE can get repetitive with its grind-heavy nature, but it’s oddly satisfying, while PvP offers everything from small skirmishes to massive wars that feel chaotic and epic.

The cash shop focuses heavily on convenience and cosmetics. While it’s not strictly pay-to-win, spending money can definitely smooth out some of the game’s rougher edges—like inventory space, weight limits, or fine-tuning your character’s appearance.

But despite its flaws, I keep coming back. There’s something addictive about the freedom this game offers, and no other MMO has managed to hook me quite like this one. If you’re ready to invest time (and maybe a little sanity), it’s absolutely worth diving into.

The crafting mode is pretty neat. It's more like you're running an enterprise and you get to invest in gathering nodes and hire workers to gather. You also invest in building nodes which allow you to build beyond the processing menu. 

Altogether, it's kinda fun, but also very boring. Granted I haven't hit max level yet. Getting there is like pulling my own teeth though which how anticlimactic the game-play is.

Mundo abierto con una buena cantidad de horas de exploración, variedad de combos en combate, personajes diferentes y con variedad de habilidades, tiene combate por zonas que va desde mucha cantidad de enemigos u otras zonas con una cantidad reducida de enemigos, es un MMO PVP y PVE donde te encontraras con muchos jugadores en el mundo con los que podrás crear hermandades y jugar con amigos y hacer duelos entre jugadores, se siente muy vivo.
El juego también cuenta con las típicas actividades que suelen tener los MMO  cómo recolección, pesca, cacería, doma de monturas, etc. 
 Y eso sin contar con los gráficos avanzados que tiene para ser un MMORPG. merece la pena probarlo. (Se ve de escándalo)

Los controles son difíciles de dominar ya que posee una gran cantidad de combos y habilidades y lo hacen un juego con un combate mas fluido, no es cómo los MMO que estamos acostumbrados donde seleccionas objetivo y pulsas habilidades aquí tienes un componente mas estratégico.

PD: se requiere de mucha paciencia y tiempo, no apto para jugadores novatos.

184311250.review:
[h2] Black Desert [/h2] 
Классная ММО RPG, с красивым графонием, с интересной non-target системой, но как и все ММО тут будет Гринд, Гринд и еще раз Гринд, и после она надоедает. И как во всех ММО в ней надо жить N_N 
[h3] Плюсы игры: [/h3]
[list]
    [*] Графика на высочайшем уровне - мир игры выглядит невероятно красиво и детально проработан.
    [*] Огромный открытый мир - игрокам дается возможность исследовать огромные территории и открывать новые локации.
    [*] Разнообразный геймплей - в игре присутствует множество активностей, начиная от сражений с монстрами до крафта и торговли.
    [*] Классы персонажей - разнообразные классы персонажей позволяют каждому игроку выбрать подходящий стиль игры.
[/list]
[h3] Минусы игры: [/h3]
[list]
    [*] Сложный геймплей - новичкам может быть сложно разобраться во всех механиках игры.
    [*] Не всегда стабильная работа серверов - иногда возникают проблемы с соединением и лагами. Проблема с появлением и исчезновением звука. 
    [*] Сложный порог вхождения для новичков, очень много информации на экране, много ивентов, что аж глаза разбегаются. 
[/list]
Отличная игра для любителей MMORPG, которая порадует красивой графикой, разнообразным геймплеем и возможностью выбора класса персонажа. Но как и все MMO RPG в ней надо прям жить.  
[quote=Wizard] 7 из 10 [/quote]

184274507.review:
If you can run this and keep it at 60 fps or above, there is no reason (that i can think of) to not play this.

I don't know how BDO was in 2017 or anywhere in between its launch and me writing this "review", but right now, it is better than every MMO i have played.

This is an Action Hack and Slash game with a lot vertical movement. You are not glued to the ground like in some other mmos or have a pathetic jump/hop that cannot clear even the shortest of fences, there is a double jump on some classes/characters and everyone else also gets a ledge/edge grab so you can lift yourself up onto structures and even mountain faces/rocks.
You can even do jump attacks on most classes which are on average not great, but its such a nice novelty to me and it is almost always absent in most action games.
All of that is packed into a beautiful vast open-world with lots of activities/things to do which are at least a little bit interesting to for the first time.

 The way it handled the beginning of my adventure alone is enough to recommend this game. They have a solid system in place to help any new players catch up to everyone else in a timely fashion.

Even if you do not plan to get to the end-game and grind, it is a Korean game after all, just doing the main questline and exploring the world while claiming the insane amount of rewards the game trows at you, should give you a satisfying experience all on its own and its not gonna be short either.

I could talk about all the pay-to-win, pay-to-skip, pay-to-look cool nonsense that this game also has (sadly), but you know what, they don't really matter! Why? Because it would only influence you(slightly, you can buy all that from other players with in-game currency) if you choose to stick around beyond the main questline and at that point, you would have already experienced a great long game that YOU ONLY HAD TO PAY FOR ONCE.
If this was subscription-based like World of Warcraft, it would be a different story.

184219308.review:
Probably one of the best games in its category.
Black Desert Online features a wide variety of classes, customization, landscape, combat and natural variety. 
You can choose to beat monsters all day or to fish and look for the rarest fish in the game world, which by the way, is huge. One of my favorite activities is exploring the ocean with my ship. You can go with a simple boat or you can grind a little to get an enviable ship, and the exploration never ends.
 Each island and npc has its own story, and it's honestly one of the most relaxing activities in the game, going where the ocean wind takes you, visiting sunny islands and golden beaches.
The game community is friendly and helpful, you can join a guild or create one and socialize with people from anywhere in the world.
The soundtrack of the game is quite good, I have about 3 or 4 songs that I searched on Ytb because they were really beautiful.
The theme of life in this game is very complex, you can choose how to dress from a huge variety of clothes, you can choose a house, you can choose what type of furniture you want to have, you can do roleplay and in general the game makes you to feel like part of it.
With all that being said, Black Desert Online is one of my favorites and I highly recommend it !

184159371.review:
[b] Black Desert [/b], Pearl Abyss tarafından geliştirilen ve yayımlanan bir MMORPG'dir. İlk olarak 2015 yılında piyasaya sürülen oyun, etkileyici grafikleri, derinlemesine karakter özelleştirme seçenekleri ve aksiyon odaklı savaş sistemiyle tanınır.


[h3] Artılar: [/h3]

[b] Etkileyici Grafikler: [/b]Black Desert, çarpıcı görselleri ve detaylı dünyasıyla dikkat çeker. Bu, oyunculara zengin bir görsel deneyim sunar. 
[b] Derinlemesine Oynanış Mekanikleri: [/b]Geniş bir içerik yelpazesi ve karmaşık sistemler, uzun süreli oynanabilirlik sağlar. Bu, oyuncuların oyunda sürekli olarak yeni şeyler keşfetmelerine olanak tanır. 
[b] Sürekli Güncellemeler: [/b]Geliştirici ekip, düzenli olarak yeni içerikler ve etkinlikler ekleyerek oyunu canlı tutar. Bu, oyuncu topluluğunun ilgisini korumaya yardımcı olur.


[h3] Eksiler: [/h3]

[b] Öğrenme Eğrisi: [/b]Oyunun karmaşık sistemleri ve mekanikleri, yeni oyuncular için başlangıçta zorlayıcı olabilir. Bu, bazı oyuncuların oyuna alışmasını zorlaştırabilir. 
[b] Tekrarlayan İçerik: [/b]Bazı oyuncular, özellikle seviye atlama sürecinde, görevlerin ve aktivitelerin tekrarlayıcı olabileceğini belirtiyor. Bu, uzun süreli oynanışta monotonluğa yol açabilir. 
[b] Mikro Ödemeler: [/b]Oyun içi mağazada sunulan bazı öğeler, "kazanmak için ödeme" (pay-to-win) endişelerine yol açabilir. Bu, oyuncular arasında adalet ve denge konusunda tartışmalara neden olabilir. 


[h3] Sonuç: [/h3]

[b] Black Desert [/b], etkileyici grafikleri ve derin oynanış mekanikleriyle MMORPG severler için çekici bir seçenek sunar. Ancak, karmaşık sistemleri ve mikro ödeme yapısı, bazı oyuncular için dezavantaj oluşturabilir. Oyunu denemeden önce, bu faktörleri göz önünde bulundurmak faydalı olacaktır.

184149973.review:
I wanted to like this game but apparently they removed Mouse Movement (normal WoW/GW2 movement) in favor of console style Mouse Look/Attack with WASD movement.  I kept trying to move/strafe with my mouse, which would make the character spaz out and waste techniques. Further complicating it, there are apparently weird keyboard+mouse combo shortcuts that you have to memorize for every class, like shift+RMB, w+LMB, and W+F, each giving different attack skills. Why can't they just have normal number based skills, and leave WASD alone? 

TLDR; I'm not a console kiddie, and I hate that gamepad style movement on the PC. There's no good reason not to have the option to do normal Mouse Movement like a decent game.

183995341.review:
Black Desert is like the love child of a stunning fashion magazine and a full-fledged MMORPG. The first thing you’ll notice (after getting over the fact that you spent 20 minutes creating the most stunningly unrealistic character you’ve ever seen) is how ridiculously beautiful the game is. No, seriously. Every leaf, every wave, and every horse’s mane look like they’ve been hand-crafted by a team of 1,000 artists who were given nothing but free time and an endless supply of coffee. It’s like you’re living in a fantasy painting that doesn’t want you to ever leave. You can spend hours just admiring the scenery, which is dangerous when you’re supposed to be leveling up your character and slaying monsters.

Now, let’s talk combat, because this is where Black Desert really flexes its muscles. It’s fast, fluid, and completely satisfying. No more standing in one spot, spamming the same attack over and over like in other MMORPGs. In Black Desert, you’re zipping across the battlefield like a ninja with an insane array of combos at your disposal. And the best part? You can literally feel the impact of every swing and spell. It’s like the game understands your need for both speed and destruction. But hey, if you’re more of a “peaceful life” type, you can also take it slow with fishing, crafting, or building your own empire. Yes, you can actually be a warrior by day and a fisherman by night. Who needs sleep anyway?

The best part of Black Desert, though? Its sheer variety. From the character customization (which, let’s face it, is a full-on career in itself) to the content that never seems to end, there’s always something new to dive into. You want to start a trading empire? Check. You want to go explore dungeons, fight giant bosses, or duel other players in the world’s most epic (and sometimes ridiculous) battles? Double check. And don’t get me started on the life skills! Whether you want to own a farm, ride horses, or start a pirate crew, Black Desert offers one of the most expansive and varied MMORPG experiences out there. If you love massive worlds, endless customization, and a world where you can literally do anything (and still look gorgeous doing it), this game is a must-play. Highly recommend for fans of the genre!

🌌 Black Desert Online
🎮 MMORPG Visualmente Deslumbrante

✔️ Gráficos incríveis: Cenários e personagens com um nível de detalhamento impressionante 🌄

✔️ Atividades diversas: Comércio, pesca, coleta, crafting, PvP e conquistas territoriais.

❌ Curva de aprendizado: O jogo pode ser complexo para iniciantes devido à variedade de sistemas e atividades 📘
❌ Modelo econômico: Pode exigir gastos adicionais para aproveitar certos aspectos ao máximo 💰
❌ Grind intenso: O progresso em níveis altos demanda bastante dedicação ⏳

Black Desert Online é um MMORPG visualmente estonteante com um combate viciante e um mundo vivo repleto de possibilidades. Ideal para jogadores que buscam uma experiência rica e imersiva, mas com a disposição de encarar sua complexidade e dedicação. 183838569.review:
The appeal to this game, for me at least, was being able to do combat as a character I designed. Though there are many things you can change about each character, it is truly limited to what class you pick. Plus, you can't choose a starter outfit which was a bit of a bummer. After that whole process, you begin the game. I started with the tutorial since I was new. The scenes looked clunky, things loaded in as scenes were playing (not a computer issue), and it felt as if there wasn't really weight to them (not to mention, the transition choices were questionable at best). The combat was not too bad, but I don't know why the spells/attacks started at slot 3 instead of 1. The worst part of it all, I literally could not progress. It told me to go over and talk to a character as a quest. Okay, simple enough... but it wasn't. It told me three different ways to talk to this guy, and none of them worked (I even tried combining them in a way and that didn't work). At this point I was done with the game, but ESC did nothing. How do I open the menu? It told me ",". It did nothing. I was clever and used a method that I learned from failing to interact with the NPC... but there was not a way to close it in the settings menu. That's it, I quit... until Alt+F4 brings up a menu instead of closing the game. I could not click any of THOSE buttons, except the one to close that menu. Task manager saved the day (not without the menu popping up right before as a jumpscare). 


I genuinely have no idea how this game has "Mostly Positive" reviews on it. Don't waste your time. Don't waste your storage. Don't play this game.


P.S. I did not realize until coming to write this review that the main trailer for this game had actual REAL life actors and not an in-game cut scene. The graphics are absolutely not that realistic, even on max settings. Huge disappointment.

[h2]Gameplay and Combat[/h2]  
BDO is renowned for its action-oriented combat system, which stands out in the MMORPG genre. [h2]Graphics and World Design[/h2]

[h2]Content and Progression[/h2]  
BDO offers a plethora of activities beyond combat, including crafting, trading, fishing, and horse taming. This variety caters to different playstyles and provides numerous avenues for progression. [b]- Performance Issues:[/b] High system requirements may lead to performance challenges on lower-end hardware.

[b]- Limited PvE Content:[/b] PvE content may feel repetitive after extended play.  

[hr][/hr]

[h2]Final Thoughts[/h2]  
Black Desert Online offers a rich and immersive MMORPG experience with its engaging combat, stunning visuals, and diverse content. 183556379.review:
Oh, bdo...

If you're considering playing this game, you need to understand that the minimum time spent to get your bearings is probably around 80-100 hours.
If you're writing a review and you haven't logged the time, it's not really helpful. However, it is absolutely true that if you don't like complex (and convoluted) games, this game is not for you, period. This game is extremely peculiar, in so many ways. You either enjoy that kind of stuff, or you don't.  

I played a lot some years ago, I lost the account, I rejoined the game a couple months ago, started from scratch. And my brain melted and seized repeatedly, even though I was already familiar with most of the game mechanics from before. Thankfully I joined the right guild, they saved me so much time trying to figure things out or having to look things up.

This is NOT a game for everyone. 

This game is NOT easy, unless all you want to do is relax, pick some flowers, catch some horses, decorate your house, or do fishing or alike. And I know quite a few players like that. They just enjoy the game for the scenery, doing quests, or doing ONLY fishing. It has a very steep learning curve, from the UI through understanding how things work, through constantly doing maths (especially if you choose to do lifeskilling). 

You don't have to engage in PVP. The game has a very rich PVE, and you don't have to do the endless grind to enjoy most of the content. And there is a LOT of content. If you do want to PVP, expect so much grind it will make santa cry. That said, the combat in the game is nothing like you've experienced before, in a good way. It's really, really good and complex.

The graphics, environment, even ambient sounds or sunsets - really amazing. Sunset in the desert, beautiful. City goes quiet, crickets come on, sun goes down, it's really enjoyable, and the different zones offer completely different ecosystems. Character creation, great. Customization, pretty great. Being able to just explore and even get lost (on the open ocean or the desert), great. Unless you're a hardcore player, there is always something to do in the game that's new and interesting. And they also add a lot of content and seasonal events, continuously.

Is it F2P?
Kinda. You can get away with it, but you don't really want to. It is NOT a P2W game. It is however pay for convenience and pay for looking at really pretty things all the time. In-game armor, even some end-game stuff, is terrifying. You will want to spend money on an outfit. However, they're giving away so much stuff these days that you don't need to spend money on that. Not really. The monthly "subscription" is about $15, and you can easily get it on sale for half off or more - worth every penny. I have spent about $80 total and got pretty much everything that's essential to your sanity (including 3 month subscription), and I still have $20 credit left. It would be super-easy to blow a lot of money in the game, they make a lot of cute/adorable pets, outfits, beautiful boat skins and carriages, horse equipment, etc. However, it is not necessary, and you can get a lot of that stuff on the marketplace for in-game money. Anyway, I feel like the $60 I've spent is accurate for the value of purchasing this game.

The bad:
* UI is super clunky and weird, takes time to get used to. It's really weird. Once you figure it out, easy peasy, but it's a steep learning curve.
* Some RNG stuff is really, truly bad & annoying. Not a deal breaker, and they're addressing a lot of that stuff right now. 
* Random weird shit will happen to you, like getting stuck in an alchemy tool, or your horse trips on a boulder and dies. or randomly walks off the cliff on it's own for no reason. It's part of the game, we just LOL at that stuff, like people having fishing chairs on their heads. Yes, after all those years, it's still buggy. To me, it's part of it's charm at this point. Nothing serious has affected me bug-wise, except mixing the main questlines (between LOML and mainland)
* Not doing the quests in order (if you're a new player) is suicide. DO NOT START A NEW CHARACTER ANYWHERE BUT VELIA! It is also imperative to do the MAIN QUESTS first and foremost, and then get distracted with everything else. Main quests are what unlocks a lot of the stuff in the game. I absolutely hate that part (the convoluted code spaghetti that is BDO - they really need to revamp the entire quest system), as I returned and made new char in LOML, which ended up being a massive time sink in trying to figure out what and why things aren't working as they should (progression for example). If you start in Velia, the on-boarding is amazing (quests and progression, introduction to lifeskilling, etc). If you start anywhere else, good luck, you will ragequit. They should not be allowing new players to start in the other two zones, period.
* There is a LOT of crap in the game. Like, stuff. Loot, items, lifeskill stuff, upgrade stuff, quest stuff, all that stuff multiplies like crazy and you won't know what is what for a long while. Stuff it in the warehouse, worry about it later. I feel like the amount of stuff in the game is way too much, and they either should shrink it (as if) or re-vamp the inventory system to provide some automation. There is also a lot of reading involved when it comes to items, each one comes with it's own essay and it's not always helpful. It's definitely a downer for me, although once you get used to everything in-game, you get a hold of it over time. Just don't try to figure everything at once. You'll blue screen. 

The good:
If you get over the initial hump, and you don't mind being patient with a convoluted system that takes a while to understand, the game can be very rewarding. I've played most of the MMOs at some point, starting with EQ beta. This one is by far the most engrossing fun MMOs on the market IF you like complex games. Unfortunately the steep learning curve kicks people out way before they had a chance to actually play it. I was a returning player and it took me a month to get to a point where I felt I have a hang on things again. It's a marathon, not a sprint. It's a game where it is understood that some things will take you months, chipping away one thing at a time. There is also a lot of AFK or semi-afk activities you can do that generate income, which is great for people who are busy and don't have time to grind all the time (like myself). You can also level up through those activities. You can setup workers on farms pretty early on, which cost close to nothing (you do need to feed them, but if you setup a worker on grain node, you can make beer immediately and thus feed the said workers - so costs you close to nothing to get your little empire going), you can do things like pound the corn batches (that your workers gather for you) semi-afk and sell the corn flour on the MP. This part is really helpful for people like me who do NOT have the time to grind constantly for money. I leave the character fishing overnight, and I'll do other lifeskills semi-afk as I work on other things (you know, RL). 

I do have to say that the game IS very Asian - and I mean it in the nicest way possible. I even have the Korean voiceovers turned on, it's so much better than the English version. There are a lot of very Asian cultural quirks in the game, even though they try VERY hard to be a "western" game - and they do succeed most of the time. Which is fine by me, but it might be a turn-off for some people who don't necessarily understand that culture. BDO is really very much it's own thing. You'll either love it or ragequit, there is no ambivalence possible, lol.
